document.full_text: amtrak and 15 states will share $2 billion in u.s. grant money aimed at developing high speed rail in the heavily traveled northeast, california and the midwest, the obama administration said on monday.
document.title: amtrak, 15 states to share $2 billion in rail grants
lines_and_colors: amtrak and 15 states will share $2 billion in u.s. grant money aimed at developing high speed rail in the heavily traveled northeast, california and the midwest, the obama administration said on monday.
